pull.title: build: Fix boost detection for arch armv7l
pull.body:
Picked from the upstream https://github.com/autoconf-archive/autoconf-archive/commit/90814f1895435ee3aa077e0880bd6aa49bf14ec3

Fix #17010.

This PR is [alternative](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/17010#issuecomment-610651736) to #18501.

events.message:
build: Update ax_boost_mase.m4 to the latest serial

This change fixes boost detection for arch armv7l.

events.body:
> Upstream is now [autoconf-archive/autoconf-archive@90814f1](https://github.com/autoconf-archive/autoconf-archive/commit/90814f1895435ee3aa077e0880bd6aa49bf14ec3)

The commit message updated.
